alert.note: Alert for Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 07 at 7:02PM EDT until July 07 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR CENTRAL WAKE COUNTY... At 702 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms have produced heavy rain across the warned area. Up to 2 inches of rain have fallen in the Raleigh area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Raleigh, Cary, Garner, Morrisville, Knightdale, Lake Wheeler and William B Umstead State Park. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads.
